DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Influence MK0859 Blood Pressure ( MK-0859-012 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: You age 4575 You man nonpregnant woman You agree eat drink fruit fruit juice ( orange , apple grapefruit ) 2 week start study medication You smoke use nicotinecontaining product ( chew tobacco ) within last 6 month You use St. John 's Wort product include within last 2 week You use herbal , organic , dietary nutritional remedy within last 2 week You history drug allergy ( anaphylaxis , angioedema ) You take investigational drug another clinical trial within last 4 week You history cardiovascular disease include hypertension ( high blood pressure ) You history renal disease You history gall bladder disease abnormal liver function test You history drug alcohol abuse You drink 6 cup caffeinated beverage day ( coffee , tea cola )
